title: Senior Software Engineer
blurb: Leading GenAI adoption and cross-functional programs, unlocking $2M in revenue
description: Currently driving GenAI technology adoption across engineering teams while leading critical cross-functional programs. Unlocked $2M in revenue by co-leading crucial time-sensitive efforts. Achieved 56% reduction in expensive customer processes through cross-functional collaboration. Led research, testing, and rollout of AI-powered merge request review agent, resulting in 82% reduction in approval time and 24% reduction in cycle time. Developing critical services handling ~2000 requests per minute and delivering hands-on AI workshops to 150+ engineers.

title: Senior Consultant
blurb: Managed multi-team delivery across Java/Spring and React teams for three client organizations
description: Orchestrated Java/Spring and React development teams across three client organizations, breaking down complex requirements into sprint-based technical plans with clear milestones. Consulted directly with clients to determine project requirements, provided strategic technical guidance, and delivered architected solutions that met critical business objectives. Specialized in cross-team coordination and technical leadership.

title: Senior Software Engineer
blurb: Developed scalable web applications using Java and Spring Boot for major trucking company
description: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using Java and Spring Boot framework for a major trucking company's payroll system. Mentored junior engineers, provided high-level code reviews, and conducted technical interviews. Focused on building robust, enterprise-level solutions that could handle high-volume transaction processing.

title: Software Engineer
blurb: Led full-stack development for insurance claims system as tech lead for team of 7 engineers
description: Led development on a full-stack web application for insurance claims processing as tech lead for a team of 7 engineers. Architected and led an innovative image quality scoring system using WebRTC for capturing vehicle damage images. Developed a Node.js package with React components for WebRTC video capturing (currently ~21 downloads per month). Engineered the migration of legacy systems to modern email services and led GraphQL implementation for enhanced API functionality.
